page.title: 05TRANSPORT:ROADS CONTINUED
page.content: In order to solve the{traffic problem Cheshire County Council intend to build{by_pass roads}around Wilmslow and Alderley Edge.The Wilmslow local by_pass is about to come into the County Council 5_year programme. No date has been set for starting work but the route is protected already from further building.Alderley Edge, however,is not in a firm programme yet.It is regarded as a longer term project.The local feeling about the by_pass is that it is necessary and since most congestion is made up of traffic passing through,it should not affect{local trade. Buses:The district is linked by road to the Greater Manchester area by the orange buses of{Greater Manchester } {Transport}and to the surrounding area by the{green Crosville services.
